product_name: Adventure Paddleboarding Explorer 2 Bamboo Stand Up Paddle Board - 11'
long_description: Made to suit a variety of age groups and ability levels, this flatwater paddle board is packed with features that will provide hours of fun, and unlock endless possibilities on the water.
